title: The declaration of the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled Directed to the high sheriffe of the county of Essex, and all other sheriffes in generall within England and Wales, concerning his Majesties proclamation about the militia.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: Printed for Joseph Hunscot and Iohn Wright,
notes: At bottom of text: Sabbathi 18 Iunii. 1642. Ordered by the Lords in Parliament assembled, that this declaration shall be forthwith printed and published. Io. Brown. Cleric. Parliament.
Declaring the illegality of the King forbidding the militia from marching or exercising without his consent.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
